<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's static html
</h1>

使用 Gatsby 构建博客，Gatsby 是一个基于 React 和 Graphql 的静态 html 构建网站，可以用于博客搭建，使用 markdown 文件，通过 markdownRemark 转化为 html;项目在基于 Gatsby default starter 的基础上，增加了 sass 预处理，使用 rem 和 vw 布局，360 - 540 下字体大小随视口大小变化

## 🚀 Quick start

1.  **Create a Gatsby site.**

    git clone repo

    ```sh
    git clone https://github.com/violet0sea/the-great-gatsby.git
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate into your new site’s directory and start it up.

    ```sh
    cd the-greate-gatsby
    yarn install
    yarn add gatsby -g
    gatsby develop
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

    _Note: You'll also see a second link: _`http://localhost:8000/___graphql`_. This is a tool you can use to experiment with querying your data. Learn more about using this tool in the [Gatsby tutorial](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/tutorial/part-five/#introducing-graphiql)._

## 🧐 What's inside?

**_可以尝试在/src/pages/blog 下添加 markdown 文件，页面会自动生成相应的路由_**
